EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Kevlar® and Nomex® MSDS
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® and Nomex® MSDS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar® and Nomex®. Below is the MSDS that you requested.
For additional MSDS (Kevlar® XP, spunlace, N636 paper,etc.), please visit our DuPont website. The MSDS FINDER is located at the very bottom right hand site of the website. www.dupont.com
Please let us know if you have any questions.
DuPont Protection Solutions
